answers.answer: I have had 6 so far and about to have another one today to see how big the baby is measuring I have gestational diabetes and baby has been measuring 3-4 weeks ahead for a while now. I am 36 weeks today. I don't think the dr would order so many if it was harmful to you or the baby.

There are no known risks of sonograms.  Im 28+4 and have had 5 so far bc my son is stubborn and they can never see what they need to.  I believe with all the discoveries and how they know too many actual xrayscan cause harm, that theyd know if there was a risk by now. My son is healthy and actually measured a week bigger when I went on the 4th.

I have read that it can be harmful! Apparently having too many, too often or too long can cause brain damage from the amniotic fluid getting too hot. Not trying to scare you! On the site it didn't say how many was "too many". I also assume if the doctor is ordering them then they are important. If it's just to find out the sex, those are considered unnecessary because it's not something you have to know for medical purposes.

question: Is too much ultrasound is harmful of pregnancy.I am in 29 week and already took 4 ultrasound and my doctor suggested for another ultrasound. So I am worry about is ultrasound is harm for baby's brain or growth
title: ultrasound in pregnancy
